Full Description: The Put-in-Bay Visitors & Convention Bureau invites you to "Put an Island In Your Life." Visit Put-in-Bay and experience an incredible array of attractions, shopping, restaurants, entertainment and things to do all in one 2.5 by 5 mile island location.   Our informational website will assist you in planning the perfect Put-in-Bay vacation getaway with hotel & resort information, home rentals, spacious condo and villa rentals. Our accommodations on the island are limited, and reserving far in advance of your planned stay is recommended.   Browse our historical attractions, Fine Put-in-Bay restaurants or sit back and read an archived collection of news articles about the history of Put-in-Bay from years gone by to current news stories. The one can't miss historical attraction is the Perry Peace Memorial towering 352 feet above ground with an observation deck to view the Bass Islands from.   Sportsmen will enjoy the best Perch and Walleye fishing in the United States right here in Lake Erie surrounding Put-in-Bay, Ohio. Our charter boat services will put you on the fish with knowledgeable local guides. If water sports are your activity of choice, Put-in-Bay offers it all from water skiing, parasailing, kayaking to Jet Ski Rentals and more.   Children will enjoy days’ worth of activities such as cave exploration, Putt-Putt, mazes, gemstone mining, swimming, free fishing, and fun but highly educational museums, tours and displays.   Our scenic nature trails are the perfect place for a walk and our beautiful State Park has stunning cliffs and views that rival mother natures best. Downtown Put-in-Bay feature De Rivera Park, a perfect spot for a cook out while the kids play on a well-equipped playground.   Our vibrant nightlife features entertainers and bands from across the United States in a variety of settings and themes. The Put-in-Bay Resort, the island's largest hotel features a large heated pool with a swim up bar & restaurant and 60 person Jacuzzi!   Our Put-in-Bay Ferry Boats offer transportation to and from Put-in-Bay as well as Middle Bass Island, Kelly's Island, the mainland and Sandusky, home of Cedar Point Amusement Park.
